name: Christmas 3D stunt extreme Car Parking Mania games
name_original: Christmas 3D stunt extreme Car Parking Mania games
description:
christmas 3D Car parking mania game

This Christmas download this new game and park the car on the proper way,follow the green signal and park the car properly,follow the green signal,park the car in a time duration and earn the star get the three Stars in every levels.in the holidays of a christmas make a lot's of fun by playing this game,the theme of this game is totally based on the christmas.This game includes the Different 3D models of cars and effective locations.

Key Features

> 3D Models of The Different Cars

-> Easy Controlling with Tilt,Steering and Buttons

-> Different level and dangerous level.. check your skill

-> User Friendly game

-> 3D Christmas theme
